name: Bubble Freeze
description:
Made for a game jam in around 48h, in March 2014.

Instructions: Click on a bubble to freeze it. Any other bubbles that touch it freeze as well. Try to reach the target number of bubbles to freeze for each level.

Inspired by Hundreds and Boomshine.

By Sergi Lázaro (@sergilazaro).
Music is an edit from Ragdolls by Doxent (ccMixter)
